original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽8.70. Pariyāpannaduka🔽Napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  pariyāpannaduka  na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca na pariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na pariyāpannam ca na apariyāpannam ca dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an object that is not included as a related object …🔽With an object that is included as a related object …🔽With an object that is both included and not included as a related object …🔽With cause as condition …🔽With object as condition …

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
